description.value:
Trigger A living creature enters the room of their own accord

Effect The trap drains the blood from all living creatures in the room, which manifests as a bloody mist in the air. All living creatures in the room are dealt @Damage[(2d6+8)[void]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:26|basic] save). On a failure, a creature increases the value of their drained condition by 1. The trap then rolls initiative.

details.description: A tiny spark of Nin's will drains the blood from living intruders.
details.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:26] (expert) to vandalize the space, or @Check[religion|dc:24] (expert) to pray to a god for passage, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (3rd rank; counteract DC 25) to counteract the magical energy

publication.title: Pathfinder #215: To Blot Out the Sun

details.reset: The trap automatically deactivates after 1 minute. It resets in 1 hour.
details.routine: (1 action) On its initiative, the trap continues to drain blood, dealing @Damage[(2d6+8)[void]] damage to all living creatures in the room (@Check[fortitude|dc:26|basic] save). On a failure, a creature increases the value of their drained condition by 1.
